name: whoa
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used when telling a horse to stop: "Whoa there, Poppy," he said to his pony, and stopped beside the kerb.
informal used when telling a person to stop what they are doing or to do it more slowly: Yes, carrots please. Whoa! That's plenty. Whoah, whoah, everybody needs to relax. A sign posted at their house reads: " Woa. Visitors Turn Back."
informal used to show that you are surprised or interested: He looks in the mirror, and he does this face that's like, "Woah! How did this happen?" Whoah, what happened? Whoa! This is fantastic!
